item.title: bahar add a quote by نادر ابراهيمي
item.description: "براي زنده ماندن به 2 خورشيد نياز داريد : يكي در قلب و يكي در آسمان" -- نادر ابراهيمي

item.title: bahar add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "Darkness cannot drive out darkness: only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate: only love can do that." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: bahar add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: bahar add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: bahar add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: bahar add a quote by Alfred Lord Tennyson
item.description: "Tis better to have loved and lost Than never to have loved at all." -- Alfred Lord Tennyson

item.title: bahar add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: bahar add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "You can't measure the mutual affection of two human beings by the number of words they exchange." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: bahar add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "Wherever you will go, I will let you down, But this lullaby goes on." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: bahar add a quote by Mary Zimmerman
item.description: "Let me die the moment my love dies. Let me not outlive my own capacity to love. Let me die still loving, and so, never die." -- Mary Zimmerman

item.title: bahar add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: bahar add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: bahar add a quote by Susan Polis Schutz
item.description: "Love is being honest with yourself at all times being honest with the other person at all times telling, listening, respecting the truth and never pretending Love is the source of reality" -- Susan Polis Schutz

item.title: bahar add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: bahar add a quote by Scott Adams
item.description: "I love you like a fat kid loves cake!" -- Scott Adams

item.title: bahar add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "When you love someone you let them take care of you." -- Jodi Picoult

item.title: bahar add a quote by Robert Marley
item.description: "One love, one heart, one destiny." -- Robert Marley

item.title: bahar add a quote by Spider Robinson
item.description: " …when writing, always hook the reader with your first sentence…in love, never settle…value yourself first and this will help you to value others…life is short, so enjoy it to the fullest…everyone in the world is different, and that’s ok…" -- Spider Robinson

item.title: bahar add a quote by bell hooks
item.description: "Living simply makes loving simple." -- bell hooks

item.title: bahar add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I had not intended to love him; the reader knows I had wrought hard to extirpate from my soul the germs of love there detected; and now, at the first renewed view of him, they spontaneously revived, great and strong! He made me love him without looking at me." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: bahar add a quote by Alison Croggon
item.description: "Love is one of the true mysteries,' he said at last. 'The truest and the deepest of all. One thing, Maerad: to love is never wrong. It may be disastrous; it may never be possible; it may be the deepest agony. But it is never wrong." -- Alison Croggon

item.title: bahar add a quote by حمید مصدق
item.description: "آه می بینم، می بینم تو به اندازه تنهایی من خوشبختی من به اندازه زیبایی تو غمگینم چه امید عبثی من چه دارم که ترا در خور؟ هیچ - من چه دارم که سزاوار تو؟ هیچ- تو همه هستی من، هستی من تو همه زندگی من هستی تو چه داری؟ همه چیز - تو چه کم داری؟ هیچ" -- حمید مصدق

item.title: bahar add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love is heavy and light, bright and dark, hot and cold, sick and healthy, asleep and awake- its everything except what it is! (Act 1, scene 1)" -- William Shakespeare
